CmdLine: apt-key adv --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv-keys ABF5BD827BD9BF62     && echo "deb http://nginx.org/packages/mainline/ubuntu/ xenial nginx" >> /etc/apt/sources.list     && apt-get update     && apt-get install --no-install-recommends --no-install-suggests -y                         ca-certificates                         nginx=${NGINX_VERSION}                         nginx-module-xslt                         nginx-module-geoip                         nginx-module-image-filter                         nginx-module-perl                         nginx-module-njs                         gettext-base     && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
Commands.Name: run
